"The error message is (please mention this when debugging): "
"VLC encountered an error with this media. Please try refreshing the media library."
An error occurred with hardware acceleration. Would you like to disable it and try again?
VLC for Android™ is a port of VLC media player, the popular open source media player. The Android™ version can read most files and network streams.
This version of VLC is compiled by:

Edward Wang, Sébastien Toque, Adrien Maglo, Jean-Baptiste Kempf, Ludovic Fauvet, Rafaël Carré, Alexandre Perraud, Michael Merg, Martin Storsjö, Rémi Duraffort, Dominique Martinet, Jean-Philippe André, Felix Abecassis, Christoph Miebach, Hugo Beauzée-Luyssen, Felix Paul Kühne, John Mooring, Pavol Rusnak, Rohit Yadav, Tanguy Pruvot, Thomas Clavier, Asad Mehmood, Garret Kelly, Philipp Dreimann, Walter Heck.
Select directories to include in the media library
Enter additional custom directory to scan:
"Disabled: better stability. Decoding: may improve performance. Full: may improve performance further."
Force hardware decoder, for advanced users only
Change the interface colours for better comfort in low light environments.
Settings when secondary displays are connected (HDMI/Miracast).
Clone the device screen without remote control.
Control brightness by gesture during video playback
Show backward and forward buttons on the video interface
Pause on headset removal; resume on headset insertion
Avoid conflicts by stealing the remote control from other apps. This prevents dialing on double click on HTC phones.
"RGB 32-bit: default chroma RGB 16-bit: better performance but lower quality YUV: best performance but does not work on all devices. Android 2.3 and later only."
Change the deblocking filter settings. Could improve video quality. Advanced users only.
Speed up decoding but could lower video quality.
Speed up and slow down audio without changing the pitch (requires a fast device).
Change the method that VLC uses to output audio.
Change the method that VLC uses to output video.
Quit and restart VLC for changes to take effect.
The amount of time to buffer network media (in ms). Does not work with hardware decoding. Leave blank to reset.
Unfortunately, a serious error has occurred and VLC had to close.
Help us improving VLC by sending the following crash log:
The action bar creates a unified and persistant navigation experience for your application and action items are a great way to provide a clear indication of what the user can do.

Action modes are used to display contextual information based on some interaction made by the user (long press, checkbox selection, etc). Like the normal action bar they also support splitting the action items to the bottom of the screen on small devices.

"This activity demonstrates how to use an ActionProvider for adding functionality to the Action Bar. In particular this demo is adding a menu item with ShareActionProvider as its action provider. The ShareActionProvider is responsible for managing the UI for sharing actions.
For now, ShareActionProviders must be displayed on the action bar"

This activity demonstrates how to implement an ActionProvider for adding functionality to the Action Bar. In particular this demo creates an ActionProvider for launching the system settings and adds a menu item with that provider.

"This activity is a demonstration of how collapsible action items work. When you are concerned about the available room for items on small screens you should use this feature.
If you are looking for a proper SearchView implementation, see this Search Views example."
"Since both ActionBarSherlock and Android use 'Menu' and 'MenuItem' class names you must take extra care when using context menus. It is still very much possible to use both in a single activity."
If you find that list and tab navigation are not suitable for your application you may replace it with a custom layout.

"This is a demonstration of how you can give an activity the look of a dialog.
While there is a light version of this theme, it cannot be set programmatically without disabling the fancy transparent outer background. In order for this effect the theme must be set in the manifest."
Use these buttons to create various configurations with the action bar to see how it behaves.
The action bar includes a standard indeterminate progress bar. The methods for accessing it are prefixed with `support`. See the source for this demo for more information.

List navigation requires the use of a special layout for the spinner item. Failure to use it will result in your spinner text being the same color as the action bar background on pre-3.0. See the source code of this demo for more information.

Overlay can be useful if you have a lot of scrolling content, especially if that content is images. Remember to lead your content with a margin so that it starts below the action bar when scrolled to the top.

"You can use the `SherlockPreferenceActivity` base class to place the action bar on top of a normal `PreferenceActivity`.
This does not yet support the use of `PreferenceFragments`, however."
The action bar includes a standard progress bar. The methods for accessing it are prefixed with `support`. See the source for this demo for more information.
SearchView allows you provide a unified mechanism of searching with optional featurs such as auto-completion and an always-expanded mode.
"This is a simple showcase of how easy it is to add the action bar to your activities. Take a look at the source code, it's surprisingly simple!"
This activity is a demonstration of how split action items work. When you are concerned about the available room for items on small screens you should use this feature.
"This is a simple showcase of how easy it is to add the action bar to your activities without having to extend from a custom activity. Take a look at the source code, it's surprisingly simple!"

"This is a simple showcase of how to style the action bar to your liking. Be sure to remember that you need to consider both the custom and native action bar when styling. Looking at this activity's style is a good way to start."
This activity is a demonstration of how sub-menus work when they are either an action item or an item in the overflow menu.

Tabs can be useful for switching between a limited number of items. You can also collapse the main body of the action bar on small devices so that only the tab bar is displayed. See the source for more information.
An example that uses an edit text dialog
An example that uses a list dialog
Launches an Activity from an Intent
This is a custom counter preference

In this mode, the Smart Plug has no access to Wi-Fi, can not remote control and some features, such as WiFi enhancements and some functions can not be used.
The update is complete! Wait until the blue light flashes slowly to complete the update.
The firmware file can not be found! Make sure the file exists and retry.
Do not quit the firmware update process, it may cause the hardware to stop working!
Are you sure you want to update？
Direct mode does not support this feature
During the Summer, humidity 40% -80% is appropriate
During the Winter, humidity of 30% -60% is appropriate
Optimum indoor temperature 23-28° C in summer
Most suitable winter indoor temperature 18-25° C
Infrared Remote Control to adjust the temperature
Using appliance that drains more than 10A or 2200W may cause short circuit and fire.
Body induction chart for the last 24 hours
Enhanced WIFI signal SSID for KonKe_
Firmware download and update process. Do not power off, please be patient. The blue light will be on for about 50 seconds and then start flashing slowly

"Firmware download and update process. Do not power off, please be patient. After the firmware download is complete, thet blue light will be on for about 50 seconds, then off (indicating the firmware update is completed), and then light on for about one second, and finally turn off (showing that it has been re-connected to the server). If that doesn't happen, re-update "

Remote mode refers to the case of small K socket connected to the WIFI network, the mobile client in a networked control it anytime, anywhere.

1. Keep small K socket access to power, wait about 30 seconds (on the left during the long bright blue LED), slow flashing blue light that has entered the configuration mode; if no slow flashing blue lights or in a configuration after a good think Reconfigure, press the left button for about 3--4 seconds to restore factory settings, and then wait about 30 seconds; 2, IOS device, click the Settings Wireless LAN in the WIFI signal list, locate the small K OK_SP3 signal emitted connection; Android devices, be sure it is connected to the internet WIFI signal; 3, into the mobile client interface] [main page, click on the + icon, select Configure box, select the WIFI internet signal, in the Password box enter the WIFI signal password, click on the √, begin configuring ; 4, the blue light flashes slowly after the first flash, the last off, the remote mode configuration has been successful; 5. Switch to the mobile client interface [main] or [Device List] page will be displayed just configured small K, click on it to enter the control page, This completes the addition of new equipment, then you can be anywhere on manipulated it for.
The left button has two functions, you can manually switch the Smart Plug on and off; long press 3-4 seconds to restore factory settings.

Direct mode refers to the small K outlets and mobile point establish a direct connection mode, at close range, through mobile clients connect directly to control the small K socket. In direct mode, the small K socket is not connected to internet network, and therefore can not remote control small K socket.
No, it is not like that. As long as the Small K is connected to the WIFI signal, the phone can be anywhere to control the Small K

"Offline" status, which means Small K socket is not connected, probably because the WIFI network disconnected, signal strength is poor or not available, please try to check the wireless network connection or restart the router. "Online" status indicating that Small K outlet online connection status, can be used normally.
Small K supports a maximum current of 10A, max power 2200W. Small K can be uses with home appliance with up to 2200W power and below.
No problem. Mobile client support to control multiple Small K socket, and no limit to the number.
In the "device" screen, preferences, you can set the Small K socket names, for easier later to distinguish it from the Small K outlet control.
Please be assured that not! As long as people do not know in your home WIFI password they can not get to your Small K.
Each Small K socket can be set up to 8 timed tasks, can be set according to their lifestyle or needs.
Small K WIFI enhancement refers to placing Small K socket reasonable position, expand WIFI signal coverage, increased WIFI signal strength, so that every corner of the house is full of WIFI.

Using a small k socket for charging the mobile phone, once full of auto power off immediately, extend cell phone battery life while saving energy, and eliminate security risks. Charge protection need to plug the power adapter in the outlet, USB port not charging protection function.
Current products only support 2.4G wireless network it does not support 5G.

Remote plugin inserted in Small K low-speed port, which is "black", otherwise ineffective. Wait about 4-5 seconds after the plug, prompt card insertion on APP, increasing the remote control plug-in icon on the main interface. Click the remote control plug-in icon, you can add a remote control panel.

RF plug in the Small K high-speed, or "white", or it will not work. Wait about 7-8 seconds after plug in, plug-in on the APP prompted to insert, increasing RF plug-in icon on the main interface. Click on the radio-plugin icon, you can add a radio-frequency remote control panel.

"1) in the main interface, click on the upper right "+", select "add a remote control", select the accessories (remote control or radio frequency), click Add needed Panel; 2) in the main interface, click interface and sliding to the right, click on the device list, select the corresponding device remote under Accessories, click Add needed Panel."

In the panel, click the button to pop up yet learning frame pointer "Wait learning", then you can see the corresponding accessories (remote control or radio frequency) indicator lights on the remote control home appliances to the corresponding button is pressed, if the light goes out, and the APP wait learning template box disappears, then learning successful, click the button, the device lights flashed, indicating the successful launch command.

When choosing a cloud-conditioned panel will pop up message box indicating "wait to learn" indicator light fittings. The air conditioning remote control is pressed against Accessories "on key", you can see the lights go out and the APP will be based on the received infrared code matching code libraries, pop possible air conditioner models to choose from.

Different air conditioning, remote infrared signal emitted by different panel buttons, different air conditioner models supported modes and wind speed is not the same, cloud-conditioned template provides a relatively common template, according to its own air conditioner models supported modes, select the corresponding button launch.

Air conditioning is more complex coding, unlike the TV each key corresponds to a separate infrared codes, each key triggers a string of code that contains all of the information temperature, mode, wind speed, etc., so common scene preset button, such as auto, cooling, heating, ventilation, dehumidification, each key corresponds to the Open button. You want to learn as refrigeration 25 degrees on a normal remote control pre-programmed the appropriate mode "cooling", the temperature of "25", and then shut down. On our custom-conditioned templates select button to enter the learning state, then press the key to complete the air conditioning learning, learning to state is the "open cooling mode of 25 degrees." Close button can learn in any state. To sum up, the air conditioning is the key to open separate study, if you want to learn various temperature and state, according to the above method in order to learn.
We have millet remote, Apple TV remote control integrated into the cloud, as long as you have the appropriate accessories that can be used directly.

Environmental plug-inserted in Small K high-speed port, or "white mouth", otherwise ineffective. Plug in wait about 7-8 seconds, APP prompt card insertion, increasing environmental widget icon on the master interface. Click the environment plug-in icon, you can check the current temperature and humidity and light conditions, you can also click on the corresponding historical data query.

Sensor plug in the Small K low-speed, or "black", or it will not work. Wait for about 4-5 seconds after plug in, plug-in on the APP prompted to insert, increased induction plug-in icon on the main interface. Click the sensor plug-in icon, you can query the sensor data. Push and linkage functions can be set according to the message, achieving security guards.
The scene is the command to be operated together as one-button operation. You can also set the execution conditions of the scene.
Set gesture passwords to prevent unauthorized viewing.
